create-quest.title: Select a credential template to start
create-quest.desc: Find the template that fit you needs

template.detail-desc: Add the details of the credential
template.tooltip-title: A claim refers to a statement or assertion made by the issuer of the credential regarding the recipient's qualifications, achievements, or attributes. It serves as the basis for the credential being issued.

tasks.title: Set tasks
tasks.desc: Add tasks to your quest that users need to accomplish to earn this credential.

optional-setting.title: Optional Settings
optional-setting.desc: These fields are not required, but you can set expiration date, time,and limit the number of credentials issued.
optional-setting.desc-date-and-time: Set a expiration date to claim the credential
optional-setting.amount-desc: Limit amount of people who can claim the credential
